hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
is_debug=0
if [ $is_debug = 1 ];then # 将结果写入远程文件 exitCode=0 arch="aarch64_(qemu-image-tiny)" fileserver_tmpfile_path="/repo/soe/check_item" comment_file=${repo}_${prid}_${arch}_comment if [ $exitCode = 0 ]; then echo "[{'name': 'check_test', 'result': 0}]" > ${comment_file} else echo "[{'name': 'check_test', 'result': 2}]" > ${comment_file} fi if [[ -f ${comment_file} ]]; then scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR ${comment_file} root@${repo_server}:$fileserver_tmpfile_path echo "upload success" fi fi

ls ${repo} pwd && ls /home/jenkins
# 创建构建目录 #sudo mkdir -p /home/jenkins/yocto-poky #if [ ! -d "/usr1" ]; then # sudo ln -s /home/jenkins/yocto-poky /usr1 #fi src_path=/usr1/openeuler/src sudo mkdir -p $src_path
# echo "log++++++++++++++++++++++" # ls -l /usr1/openeuler/gcc/openeuler_gcc_arm64le/aarch64-openeuler-linux-gnu/lib64/* # exit 0
# 下载构建脚本 build_script=/usr1/scripts if [ ! -d "$build_script" ]; then sudo git clone https://gitee.com/openeuler/openeuler-os-build.git -b "master" -v $build_script else pushd $build_script git config --global --add safe.directory /usr1/scripts git status sudo git config pull.ff only sudo git reset --hard HEAD^ || echo "" sudo git reset --hard HEAD sudo git clean -dfx sudo git pull popd fi
# 使用当前pr的代码替换本地源码 sudo rm -rf $src_path/${repo} sudo cp -r $WORKSPACE/${repo} $src_path
# 安装构建环境，下载代码 sudo rm -rf ${src_path}/kernel-5.10 #downloadBranch=${tbranch} downloadBranch="openEuler-22.03-LTS" if [[ ${tbranch} == "yocto_refactor" || ${tbranch} == "gitee_pages" ]]; then downloadBranch="openEuler-22.03-LTS" fi sudo sh ${src_path}/${repo}/scripts/download_code.sh "" ${downloadBranch}
# 执行构建脚本 sudo sh $build_script/script/embedded/compile/build.sh "aarch64-std" "yes" "no" "no" "openeuler-image-tiny"
# 删除修改过的代码 sudo rm -rf $src_path/${repo}
# 加测试代码 # 将测试项结果汇总到acl文件

#BUILD_ARCH="arm" BUILD_ARCH="aarch64"
# 目前只有aarch64有tiny镜像，设置时需要注意 #IMAGE_TYPE="std" IMAGE_TYPE="tiny"
BUILD_BRANCH=${tbranch} #BUILD_BRANCH="master" if [[ ${tbranch} == "yocto_refactor" || ${tbranch} == "gitee_pages" ]]; then BUILD_BRANCH="openEuler-22.03-LTS" fi
workspace_parent_dir=$( cd ${WORKSPACE}/../ || exit 1 pwd ) # 规避工程文件夹带括号 sudo rm -rf ${workspace_parent_dir}/test_run_dir_* mkdir -p ${workspace_parent_dir}/test_run_dir_${BUILD_ARCH}_${IMAGE_TYPE}_${BUILD_NUMBER} run_test_dir="${workspace_parent_dir}/test_run_dir_${BUILD_ARCH}_${IMAGE_TYPE}_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
# 清理现场 防止上次构建有残留 if [[ -e ${run_test_dir}/mugen/qemu_ctl.sh && -e ${run_test_dir}/mugen/conf/qemu_info.json ]]; then sudo sh ${run_test_dir}/mugen/qemu_ctl.sh stop fi
SDK_INSTALL_PATH=${run_test_dir}/sdk/${BUILD_ARCH}
sudo rm -rf ${run_test_dir}/mugen sudo rm -rf ${run_test_dir}/image sudo rm -rf ${SDK_INSTALL_PATH}
# 创建工作目录 mkdir -p ${run_test_dir}/sdk mkdir -p ${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH} mkdir -p ${SDK_INSTALL_PATH}
# 直接下载镜像和SDK，std镜像 # zImage=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/openEuler-22.03-LTS/embedded_img/arm64/aarch64-std/zImage # rootfs=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/openEuler-22.03-LTS/embedded_img/arm64/aarch64-std/openeuler-image-qemu-aarch64-20220622180107.rootfs.cpio.gz # sdk=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/openEuler-22.03-LTS/embedded_img/arm32/arm-std/openeuler-glibc-x86_64-openeuler-image-armv7a-qemu-arm-toolchain-22.03.sh
# wget ${zImage} --no-check-certificate -O ${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/zImage # wget ${rootfs} --no-check-certificate -O ${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/initrd # wget ${sdk} --no-check-certificate -O ${run_test_dir}/sdk/toolchain.sh
# 从构建输出文件夹获取镜像和SDK outputdir="/usr1/output" zImage_path=$(find ${outputdir} -name "zImage") initrd_path=$(find ${outputdir} -name "openeuler-image-*qemu-*.rootfs.cpio.gz")
cp -r ${zImage_path} ${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/zImage cp -r ${initrd_path} ${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/initrd
if [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "std" ]]; then toolchain_path=$(find ${outputdir} -name "openeuler-glibc-*-toolchain-*.sh") cp -r ${toolchain_path} ${run_test_dir}/sdk/toolchain.sh
# 配置sdk sh ${run_test_dir}/sdk/toolchain.sh <<EOF ${SDK_INSTALL_PATH} Y EOF
environment_script=$(find ${SDK_INSTALL_PATH} -name "environment-setup-*-openeuler-*") for one_env_script in ${environment_script[@]}; do source ${one_env_script} done
# openEuler-22.03-LTS分支需要手动执行编译, master分支已经可以在source时自动执行 if [[ $BUILD_BRANCH == "openEuler-22.03-LTS" ]]; then kernel_src_path=$(find ${SDK_INSTALL_PATH}/sysroots -name "kernel" | grep "usr/src/kernel") cd ${kernel_src_path} make modules_prepare fi fi
git clone https://gitee.com/openeuler/mugen.git ${run_test_dir}/mugen #git clone -b add_emb_fun https://gitee.com/saarloos/mugen.git ${run_test_dir}/mugen
cd ${run_test_dir}
# 测试sdk设置用，std镜像 # echo ' # cyclictest: # git clone https://gitee.com/mirrors/rt-tests.git # make -C ./rt-tests # cp ./rt-tests/cyclictest ./ # rm -rf rt-tests # clean: # rm -rf rt-tests # rm -rf cyclictest # ' >> ${run_test_dir}/mugen/testcases/embedded-test/security_config_test/makefile
# 设置需要执行的测试套, 目前一致, 后面一定会不同 if [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "std" ]]; then run_suitecase=("embedded_security_config_test") elif [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "tiny" ]]; then run_suitecase=("embedded_tiny_image_test") fi
# 创建多测试套结果保存文件夹 results_path="${run_test_dir}/results" sudo rm -rf ${results_path} mkdir -p ${results_path}
# 执行测试 pushd "${run_test_dir}/mugen" # 安装测试执行依赖 sudo sh -x dep_install.sh -e
if [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "std" ]]; then # 为qemu配置一个可用的IP地址，防止有其他qemu已经占用IP last_ip_num=$(($RANDOM%250+2)) can_ip_use=0 for i in {1...10}; do ret=0 ping "192.168.10.${last_ip_num}" -c 1 || can_ip_use=1 if [ $can_ip_use -eq 1 ]; then break; fi done if [ $can_ip_use -eq 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: can't get a ip set to qemu." exit 1 fi last_pwd_num=$(($RANDOM%1000)) # 启动qemu sudo sh -x qemu_ctl.sh start --qemu_type "${BUILD_ARCH}" \ --passwd "openEuler@${last_pwd_num}" \ --host_ip "192.168.10.1" \ --qemu_ip "192.168.10.${last_ip_num}" \ --put_all \ --kernal_img_path "${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/zImage" \ --initrd_path "${run_test_dir}/image/${BUILD_ARCH}/initrd" rem_run_str="-s" need_env_str="" elif [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "tiny" ]]; then mkdir -p conf echo '{ "NODE": [ { "ID": 1, "LOCALTION": "local", "MACHINE": "physical", "FRAME": "aarch64", "NIC": "lo0", "MAC": "", "IPV4": "127.0.0.1", "USER": "root", "PASSWORD": "", "SSH_PORT": 22, "BMC_IP": "", "BMC_USER": "", "BMC_PASSWORD": "" } ] }'>> conf/env.json export FIND_TINY_DIR=${outputdir} rem_run_str="" need_env_str="-E" fi
for one_suite in ${run_suitecase[@]}; do # 执行测试套编译准备 sudo bash mugen.sh -b ${one_suite}
echo " pushd \"${run_test_dir}/mugen\" sudo ${need_env_str} bash mugen.sh -f ${one_suite} ${rem_run_str} popd exit 0 ">> ${run_test_dir}/tmp_test_run_${one_suite}.sh sh -x ${run_test_dir}/tmp_test_run_${one_suite}.sh # 拷贝测试套执行结果 cp -Rrf ${run_test_dir}/mugen/results/${one_suite} ${results_path}/ || exit 0 rm -rf ${run_test_dir}/tmp_test_run_${one_suite}.sh done
if [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "std" ]]; then # 关闭qemu sudo sh qemu_ctl.sh stop elif [[ $IMAGE_TYPE == "tiny" ]]; then rm -rf conf/env.json fi
popd
exitCode=0 # 可以忽略的测试失败用例 ignoreFail=("oe_test_check_file_sys_protect_005" "oe_test_check_network_firewall_001" "oe_test_check_network_firewall_002" "oe_test_check_ssh_config_002" "oe_test_check_file_sys_protect_004") # 分析用例执行结果 for one_suite in ${run_suitecase[@]}; do checkFail="" if [ -e ${run_test_dir}/mugen/results/${one_suite}/failed ]; then checkFail=$(ls ${run_test_dir}/mugen/results/${one_suite}/failed/) fi
for oneFail in ${checkFail[@]}; do if [[ "${ignoreFail[*]}" =~ "${oneFail}" ]]; then echo "INFO: ignore $oneFail test fail" else echo "ERROR: run $oneFail test fail" exitCode=1 fi done done
# 将结果写入远程文件 arch="aarch64_(qemu-image-tiny)" fileserver_tmpfile_path="/repo/soe/check_item" comment_file=${repo}_${prid}_${arch}_comment
if [ $exitCode = 0 ]; then echo "[{'name': 'check_test', 'result': 0}]" > ${comment_file} else echo "[{'name': 'check_test', 'result': 2}]" > ${comment_file} fi if [[ -f ${comment_file} ]]; then scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR ${comment_file} root@${repo_server}:$fileserver_tmpfile_path echo "upload success" fi
